name: Appetité Amor
description:
Fianna is good at anything she puts her mind to — which usually involves trying to max out her stats, inhaling copious amounts of food and doing her best in avoiding getting into Guild House brawls. A pleasant twist of fate leads her to find Cafe Amor and its otherworldly — quite literally — chef, Leon. 

Join Fianna and Leon as they face magical beasts, mysterious entities and something far more strange and wonderful than anything they have ever faced: their growing relationship.

Features:
  • Over 7k Words
  • 3 Endings (Good End, Best End and ?!?)
  • 2 CGs and 5 Food CGs
  • Original Soundtrack
  • A colourful, comedic food fantasy to warm your heart!
  • And an often blushing love interest ~
Credits:

Project Lead & Artist: Azuremia 
Co-Lead, Sprite/CG Linartist/Colourist & Food Colourist: Akua

Like it? Love it?

Comment below and tell us your impressions! With your feedback we might expand on the story of Fianna and Leon!

Don't know what to say? How about telling us about your favourite food illustration? Do you like Fianna or Leon more (or both)? The dynamic between them and the little quips and quirks you liked! We'd like to hear your answer ~!
